1 #!/usr/bin/env python3
2 
3 import rospy
4 import threading
5 from flask import Flask ,request
6 from multi_robot_sim.srv import MultiRobotSimSpawnRobot, MultiRobotSimGoalNodes, MultiRobotSimRobot
7 from utils.osm_utils import OsmUtil
8 from std_srvs.srv import Trigger
9 
10 app = Flask(__name__)
11 
12 threading.Thread(target=lambda: rospy.init_node('Server_node', disable_signals=True)).start()
13 
14 while(True):
15  if(rospy.has_param("/yaml_path")):
16  break
17 
18 path = rospy.get_param("/yaml_path")
19 gg = OsmUtil(path)
20 
21 @app.route("/api/robot" , methods=['GET', 'POST','DELETE'])
22 def spawnRobot():
23 
24  if request.method == 'POST':
25 
26  robot_name = request.args.get('robot_name', default="robot")
27  node = request.args.get('node', type=int)
28  yaw = request.args.get('yaw', default=0, type=float)
29 
30  # Check for node arg
31  if node == None:
32  return "Invalid request, node not found"
33 
34  # Check if node is valid
35  coor = gg.getPathPoints([node])
36  if coor == None:
37  return "Invalid Node"
38 
39  x_pos = coor[0][0]
40  y_pos = coor[0][1]
41 
42  # Spawn robot
43  try:
44  rospy.wait_for_service('spawn_robot',5.0)
45  spawn_srv = rospy.ServiceProxy('spawn_robot', MultiRobotSimSpawnRobot)
46  res = spawn_srv(robot_name,x_pos,y_pos,yaw)
47  return res.result
48 
49  except (rospy.ServiceException, rospy.ROSException) as e:
50  return "Service call failed: %s"%e
51 
52 
53  if request.method == 'DELETE':
54  robot_name = request.args.get('robot_name', default="robot")
55  try:
56  rospy.wait_for_service('del_robot',5.0)
57  del_srv = rospy.ServiceProxy('del_robot', MultiRobotSimRobot)
58  res = del_srv(robot_name)
59  return res.result
60 
61  except (rospy.ServiceException, rospy.ROSException) as e:
62  return "Service call failed: %s"%e
63 
64 
65  if request.method == 'GET':
66  robot_name = request.args.get('robot_name', default="")
67  try:
68  rospy.wait_for_service('robot_status',5.0)
69  status_srv = rospy.ServiceProxy('robot_status', MultiRobotSimRobot)
70  res = status_srv(robot_name)
71  return res.result
72 
73  except (rospy.ServiceException, rospy.ROSException) as e:
74  return "Service call failed: %s"%e
75 
76 @app.route("/api/navigation/move" , methods=['POST'])
77 def move():
78  json = request.json
79  print(json["robot_name"])
80  try:
81  rospy.wait_for_service(json["robot_name"]+'/send_waypoint',5.0)
82  move_srv = rospy.ServiceProxy(json["robot_name"]+'/send_waypoint', MultiRobotSimGoalNodes)
83  res = move_srv(json["nodes"],json['mode'])
84 
85  if(res.result):
86  return "robot moving"
87 
88  return "failed"
89  except (rospy.ServiceException, rospy.ROSException) as e:
90  return "Service call failed: %s"%e
91 
92 @app.route("/api/navigation/start" , methods=['POST'])
93 def start():
94  robot_name = request.args.get('robot_name', default="")
95  try:
96  rospy.wait_for_service(robot_name+'/start_waypoint',5.0)
97  start_srv = rospy.ServiceProxy(robot_name+'/start_waypoint', Trigger)
98  res = start_srv()
99 
100  if(res.success):
101  return "robot resume navigation"
102 
103  return "failed"
104  except (rospy.ServiceException, rospy.ROSException) as e:
105  return "Service call failed: %s"%e
106 
107 @app.route("/api/navigation/stop" , methods=['POST'])
108 def stop():
109  robot_name = request.args.get('robot_name', default="")
110  try:
111  rospy.wait_for_service(robot_name+'/stop_waypoint',5.0)
112  stop_srv = rospy.ServiceProxy(robot_name+'/stop_waypoint', Trigger)
113  res = stop_srv()
114 
115  if(res.success):
116  return "robot stop navigation"
117 
118  return "failed"
119  except (rospy.ServiceException, rospy.ROSException) as e:
120  return "Service call failed: %s"%e
121 
122 @app.route("/api/navigation/pause" , methods=['POST'])
123 def pause():
124  robot_name = request.args.get('robot_name', default="")
125  try:
126  rospy.wait_for_service(robot_name+'/pause_waypoint',5.0)
127  pause_srv = rospy.ServiceProxy(robot_name+'/pause_waypoint', Trigger)
128  res = pause_srv()
129 
130  if(res.success):
131  return "robot pause navigation"
132 
133  return "failed"
134  except (rospy.ServiceException, rospy.ROSException) as e:
135  return "Service call failed: %s"%e
